name: SUDOKI
description:
SUDOKI - A ZERO ESCAPE FAN GAME

are you desperate for zero time dilemma??? need something to refresh your memory??? want to have a little fun before you suffer in hell for the rest of eternity???????

consider playing sudoki!!!!

features:

  • 3 protagonists. 23 routes. 46 endings.
  • 1 secret bonus ending.
  • like 36k words of dialogue apparently
  • art from tumblr users @aerryi, @braidcut, @clonoko, @cookieekun,@dapperyoungmiss, @dipsnart, @drakanekurashiki, @drklim,@maepng, @oomph833, @tatsumiyasss, @tropicalmandiblesattack, and @twergo (that's me!) (thank you all so much!!!)

sudoki is a high school au(?) dating sim(?) rated T for Teen. includes some swearing, creative threats, mild violence, pda, brief emeto mention, discussion of food, spoilers for 999 and vlr, and my very heart and soul.

characters and concepts belong to uchikoshi!! some of the art in here is old (apologies to respective artists for taking so loNG) but it's all wonderful and everyone worked very hard and i'm super proud of this, please consider giving it a shot! each route is fairly short on its own, but there are lots of them. thank you for your patience
